title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 635, subpt. 635-11 - Enrollment in Medicare Prescription Drug Plans and Fully Integrated Duals Advantage Plans for Individuals with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities (FIDA-IDD)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 635, subpt. 635-11 - Enrollment in Medicare Prescription Drug Plans and Fully Integrated Duals Advantage Plans for Individuals with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities (FIDA-IDD)

State Regulations
§ 635-11.1 - Applicability and definitions
§ 635-11.2 - PDP enrollment and reviews for persons residing in a residential facility operated or certified by OPWDD or a family care home
§ 635-11.3 - PDP enrollment and reviews for persons not residing in a residential facility or a family care home
§ 635-11.4 - FIDA-IDD enrollment and reviews for persons residing in a residential facility operated or certified by OPWDD or a family care home
§ 635-11.5 - FIDA-IDD plan enrollment and reviews for persons not residing in a residential facility or a family care home
§ 635-11.6 - Other responsibilities and rights of agencies and sponsoring agencies regarding PDP enrollment and reviews
§ 635-11.7 - Other responsibilities and rights of CEOs and DDSOO and DDRO directors or designees regarding FIDA-IDD plan enrollment and reviews
§ 635-11.8 - CCO enrollment and reviews for persons residing in a residential facility operated or certified by OPWDD or a family care home
§ 635-11.9 - CCO enrollment and reviews for persons not residing in a residential facility or a family care home
§ 635-11.10 - Other responsibilities and rights of CEOs and DDSOO and DDRO directors or designees regarding CCO enrollment and reviews

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 635, subpt. 635-11

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§13.07[a], [c], 13.09[b], 13.15[a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
